attributes.description: View our newest products for your classroom and lab.
For a quarter century, Carolina Biological Supply has been committed to bringing biotechnology into the classroom.

subMenus.description: Explore our extensive selection of biotechnology kits covering advanced topics such as electrophoresis, gene expression and more.
Outift your Biotechnology lab with Carolina Quality.  A wide product selection—from gel chambers to power supplies, centrifuges and pipets.
Biotechnology materials and supplies that support all levels from basic to advanced.  Shop with confidence at Carolina—we have a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
Introduce your students to DNA using simple produces that are engaging and economical. Perfect for middle-high school students.
Carolina makes DNA gel electrophoresis easy when studying forensics or genetics.  There's a simple set up with consistent results.
Examine the fascinating aspects of DNA structur with hands-on activities.  Models and simulations are available for all educational levels.
Easily demonstrate PCR with hands-on activites for all levels of science.  We have all of the equipment, chemicals and kits you will need.
Take students through DNA protein analysis and demonstrate the role of proteins in cells.  We have quality protein analysis supplies appropriate for all ages.
Push the limit of what is done in the traditional classroom with transformation and transfer DNA concepts.

topCategories.description: Explore our extensive selection of biotechnology kits covering advanced topics such as electrophoresis, gene expression and more.
Carolina makes DNA gel electrophoresis easy when studying forensics or genetics.  There's a simple set up with consistent results.
Outift your Biotechnology lab with Carolina Quality.  A wide product selection—from gel chambers to power supplies, centrifuges and pipets.

attributes.description: Building Blocks of Science Elementary Curriculum  offers kits that are affordable and easy to implement in your classroom.

subMenus.description: Buliding Blocks of Science Kits for Grades K-2 are resuable! Just reorder the fresh supplies you need and reuse the rest.
Buiilding Blocks of Science Kits for grades 3-5 meet the Next Generation Science, Common Core Literacy and Math Standards
Each Building Blocks of Science® replacement parts list contains all or most of the unit’s kit components. Buy only what you need to continue using your Building Blocks of Science® kit.

topCategories.description: Buliding Blocks of Science Kits for Grades K-2 are resuable! Just reorder the fresh supplies you need and reuse the rest.
Buiilding Blocks of Science Kits for grades 3-5 meet the Next Generation Science, Common Core Literacy and Math Standards

attributes.description: We offer top-notch chemistry supplies and AP® Chemistry products, backed by our expert technical support.

subMenus.description: Carolina offers the highest quality kits for a hands-on approach within AP Chemistry classrooms.  We provide products designed for the new and old curriculum.
Carolina offers a variety of resources that can be used in lesson plans when teaching about atomic structure and the periodic table.
Learning about organic chemistry, biochemistry and polymers is tangible and fun! Teach advanced concepts through everyday applications with Carolina products
Carolina offers high impact activities with visible results for teaching Chemical Kinetics & Equilibrium. Kits cover topics like chemical reactions & thermodynamics.
Carolina has a great selection of all-inclusive kits that minimize lab prep time at any grade level.  Simplify teaching with use of our instructional videos.
Choose from over 850 chemical products in chemical grades, sizes and concentrations to meet your needs.
Resources for exploring chemical properties of matter will cover topics such as  moelcular structure, gas laws, and more.
Carolina provides all of your chemistry lab supply needs including chemicals, balances, stirrers, glassware, centrifuges, hot plates, and more!
From the periodic table to molecular model sets, Carolina has what you need. Lessons include elements, compounds, and mixtures are available.
Hands-on classroom kits with detailed teacher's manuals minimize teacher prep time and maximize student engagement by using guided inquiry to help students understand fundamental chemistry concepts.
With the Inquiries in Science Chemistry Series students will design and carry out their own investigation helping them understand hard to grasp concepts.
Using molecular models is the easiest way for each student to visualize shape.  We have the widest selection of models for a great hands-on teachig experience.
pH testing made easy with all the supplies you need for your biology and chemistry classrooms or laboratory practices.
Carolina has top spectrophotometer brands for educational and research level capabilities.  Complete selection at a great price.
Diverse selection of resources from elementary through college level.  Posters, charts, software, games, and books to excite students and make learning easy.

topCategories.description: Choose from over 850 chemical products in chemical grades, sizes and concentrations to meet your needs.
Carolina offers the highest quality kits for a hands-on approach within AP Chemistry classrooms.  We provide products designed for the new and old curriculum.
pH testing made easy with all the supplies you need for your biology and chemistry classrooms or laboratory practices.

attributes.description: Enhance the science experience with Carolina's lab kits designed specifically for college-level distance education.
Carolina Science Online®, our new eLearning platform, brings your classroom to life with resources for all ages.

subMenus.description: Interactive, engaging and elementary age appropriate.  Quality digital science resources and outstanding support for STEM concpets.
Stale lesson plans?  Try a fresh approach with these interactive and engaging lessons.  Make difficult concepts easy to learn!
Stimulating digital resorces for the high school classroom. eBooks and acitivities that will help students remember what they are learning!
eLearning resources for college are the way to go. Affordable and comprehensive, each eLearning product will deliver a memorable learning experience.

topCategories.description: Interactive, engaging and elementary age appropriate.  Quality digital science resources and outstanding support for STEM concpets.
Stale lesson plans?  Try a fresh approach with these interactive and engaging lessons.  Make difficult concepts easy to learn!
Stimulating digital resorces for the high school classroom. eBooks and acitivities that will help students remember what they are learning!

attributes.description: Carolina is proud to offer one of the most extensive lines of lab supplies and equipment in the industry.

subMenus.description: Quality selection of science lab glassware designed to address accuracy and safety.  Affordable price with superior performance.
Carolina is your quality source for a well-equipped lab. Take time to view our high quality science lab equipment that has proven durability to handle any lab activity.
All of the finest quality measuring equipment is located at Carolina.  Precise and efficient results guaranteed.
Shop a complete line of safety products for the classroom and lab.  We have everything you need to outfit or replenish your lab—all at a 100% unconditional guarantee.
We offer a full range of dissecting equipment to fit all your lab needs.  There are sets available for all skill levels or can be customized.
Carolina offers a large selection of supplies that will make your laboratory safe and efficient.  Labware can be purchased in packages and kits for your convenience.
Outift your Biotechnology lab with Carolina Quality.  A wide product selection—from gel chambers to power supplies, centrifuges and pipets.
We offer a quality selection of laboratory and classroom furniture, as well as design assistance to customize your solution.
Everything you need to prepare your own microscope slides.  Quality supplies and all-inclusive preparation kits.

topCategories.description: Quality selection of science lab glassware designed to address accuracy and safety.  Affordable price with superior performance.
We offer a full range of dissecting equipment to fit all your lab needs.  There are sets available for all skill levels or can be customized.
Carolina is your quality source for a well-equipped lab. Take time to view our high quality science lab equipment that has proven durability to handle any lab activity.

attributes.description: Carolina covers the world of life science with everything from slides and kits to Agricultural and Vet Science.

subMenus.description: We have kits for new and traditional AP Biology labs.  Choose from our kits, follow a college board lab, or design your own with our wide variety of equipment and supplies.
A wide variety of natural-bone and plastic skeletons, as well as detailed anatomical models appropriate for all skill levels.
Carolina offers a wide range of hands-on materials you need to effectively teach students about body systems.Engage your students with quality products and content tailored to meet your needs.
Biology Kits
Career and Technical Education

Offer your students a unique prespective on the world around them. Carolina's environmental science kits focus on areas that relate to earth systems and resources, ecological systems, issues & impacts on the environment, & sustainability and solutions.
Carolina offers a variety of resources and products to help your students delve into the emerging area of Genetics.
Live Biology
Help your students build the skills they need for microbiology studies. From culture growth/ID to antibiotic resistance and environmental sampling, Carolina is sure to have everthing you need.
Microscope slides and slide sets for any grade level, expertly prepared and guaranteed.

topCategories.description: We have kits for new and traditional AP Biology labs.  Choose from our kits, follow a college board lab, or design your own with our wide variety of equipment and supplies.
Prepare your students for medical and lab tech careers with Carolina's wide range of equipment, kits and models.
Carolina offers a variety of resources and products to help your students delve into the emerging area of Genetics.

attributes.description: For over 80 years, Carolina has been providing the highest-quality living organisms and cultures available..

subMenus.description: Teach multiple concepts with our wide selection of animals that are tailored specifically to education.
All the aquaria supplies you need to support life in the water with minimal maintenance. From ecosystems to freshwater animals, you will find it easy to set up or maintain your classroom aquaria.
Vast selection of ready to use biological media  to meet diverse needs.  In stock and ready to ship!
With a large selection of fungi kits and sets available, our cultures are a multifunctional tool for teaching ecology, genetics, and biochemistry concepts.
Our insects are easy and safe for students of all age levels to handle for classroom use and provide a fascinating way to create real interest in life cycle studies.
Order you STC and Foss Living materials in advance use our prepaid vouchers to have them arrive when you need them!
subMenus.displayName: K-8 Curriculum & FOSS Living Shipments & Vouchers

subMenus.description: Carolina plants are a great tool for teaching cell respiration and photosynthesis. Selection includes  aquatic and classroom plants.
Over 100 bacteria cultures, including Halobacterium & E. Coli. Single celled organisms that are safe and suitable for all skill levels.
Our company was founded on the development of quality protist cultures.  They arrive ready to use with complete care guides and are pure and uncontaminated.
Wisconsin fast plants offer an interactive and virtually maintenance-free way to learn about the plant life cycle within just 30-45 days.

topCategories.description: Our butterflies can be purchased at every stage to help demonstrate their beautiful life cycle to students.
Vast selection of ready to use biological media  to meet diverse needs.  In stock and ready to ship!
Carolina plants are a great tool for teaching cell respiration and photosynthesis. Selection includes  aquatic and classroom plants.

attributes.description: Carolina's extensive assortment of compound and stereomicroscopes span virtually all grade levels and applications.

subMenus.description: Quality binoculars for bird and wildlife study as well as astronomical telescopes with on-board computers.
Popular corded compound microscopes and cordless microscopes for elementary to advanced use. We have the compound microscope you are looking for!
Make small scale images available to the entire class with our latest digital cameras.  Carolina offers the broadest selection of the newest technology.
Digital microscopes are great for large classroom computer combined instruction.  Students can take images, videos, and more.
Our lightweight, portable field microscopes have a rugged and durable construction.  They are easy to use for elementary use through high school!
Wide selection of magnifiers for elementary and middle school.  Great for close-up look at stamps, coins, insects and dissections!
We have all of the accessories you could need or want for your new or current microscope!  Lights, parts, and storage are available with 100% satisfaction guaranteed!
Microscope slides and slide sets for any grade level, expertly prepared and guaranteed.
Stereomicroscopes show 3D images vs. flat images and are easier to focus and use.  They are great for first tme student use.

topCategories.description: Popular corded compound microscopes and cordless microscopes for elementary to advanced use. We have the compound microscope you are looking for!
Digital microscopes are great for large classroom computer combined instruction.  Students can take images, videos, and more.
Stereomicroscopes show 3D images vs. flat images and are easier to focus and use.  They are great for first tme student use.

attributes.description: Get your students inspired with high school physical science kits, robotics, Carolina ChemKits, and much more.

subMenus.description: Alternative energy kits provide great insight in to applications such as hydropower, wind power, and aco-battery vehicles.
Teach long term earth changes in real time and study the atmosphere, weather and climate and their impact on sustaining life.
Electrical education fully charged!  Demonstrate the power of electricity through generators, electrostatics, circuitry, conductivity, and more!

Offer your students a unique prespective on the world around them. Carolina's environmental science kits focus on areas that relate to earth systems and resources, ecological systems, issues & impacts on the environment, & sustainability and solutions.
One stop for all your classical mechanics science and energy education needs.  Exciting activities that make science active and fun!
Kits that simplify complex heat and thermodynamics concepts.  Radiate excitement that leads to new insights with hands-on activities.
From rulers to balances, timers, calipers, and density items, Carolina has what you need.  Products support accurate and precise data collection.
Tap into the senses with visual displays of color and sound.  Build knowledge needed for the next generation standards.
Fun, hands-on kit shows how magnetism works.  Amazing array of lead-free magnets with various strengths and uses.
One stop for all your classical mechanics science and energy education needs.  Exciting activities that make science active and fun!
Trust Carolina for physical science instruments and equipment including vaccuum pumps, power supplies, bench meters, and more.  Warranties included!
Time-saving, reusable kits including equipment needed.  Great starting point and building blocks for a solid physical science education.
Physics Kits
Making properties of matter, matter to students!  Resources for general science and chemistry teachers.
Robotic technology is active, fun, and fascinating.  Gets students excited about STEM concepts with our accessories and sets!
Take learning outside for unforgettable fun!  Convenient launch sets for our rockets have everything you need for construction and launch, and are very safe.
Diverse selection of resources that engage students and reinforce learning.  Posters, games, charts, software and DVDs help engage and excite students.

topCategories.description: Teach long term earth changes in real time and study the atmosphere, weather and climate and their impact on sustaining life.
One stop for all your classical mechanics science and energy education needs.  Exciting activities that make science active and fun!
One stop for all your classical mechanics science and energy education needs.  Exciting activities that make science active and fun!

attributes.description: Carolina has the best specimens available, along with dissecting supplies, instruments, and much more.

subMenus.description: Carolina's Perfect Solution specimens are a safe, non-toxic alternative to Formalin. Carolina's innovative, proprietary tissue fixative produces superior specimens with life-like tissue texture and color.
Carolina is recognized as a leader in providing preserved organisms. Options include full body structures or organs.
For over 80 years, Carolina has provided superior non-mammal specimens that engage students in hands-on dissecting experiments.
Invest in quality displays you can re-use for years. Carolina offers biological displays as an alternative to traditional dissection that are geat for testing and structure identification.
Carolina provides a varity of dissection kits that are perfect for the exploration of Anatomy and Physiology in a variety of preserved specimens.
We offer a full range of dissecting equipment to fit all your lab needs.  There are sets available for all skill levels or can be customized.
Carolina supplies everything you need to mount and detail your work including mounting boards, pins, and specimen tags.
Carolina provides owl pellet products that are heat sterilized and easy to use for students of all ages. Excellent for hands-on, inquiry-based learning.
Create and display your preserved plants using Carolina's Preserved Botany Supplies. We have professional and student plant presses as well as mounting paper.
Carolina is your trusted source for a diverse slection of preserved resources to reinforce learning such as, posters, games, charts, software, DVDs, and more

topCategories.description: Carolina's Perfect Solution specimens are a safe, non-toxic alternative to Formalin. Carolina's innovative, proprietary tissue fixative produces superior specimens with life-like tissue texture and color.
Carolina provides owl pellet products that are heat sterilized and easy to use for students of all ages. Excellent for hands-on, inquiry-based learning.
For over 80 years, Carolina has provided superior non-mammal specimens that engage students in hands-on dissecting experiments.

attributes.description: K–8 inquiry-based, hands-on science curriculum that paves the way to deep understanding of phenomena through 3-dimensional learning.

subMenus.description: Moving to NGSS? Begin with STC-Kindergarten™, written explicitly for these standards. STC for Grades 1–5 integrates the three dimensions of NGSS and engineering design using real-world applications.
ALL NEW for Middle School from the Smithsonian! Teaching NGSS is more than checking off standards. STCMS™ immerses students in 3-dimensional learning rooted in phenomena and engineering design.
Thank you for your continued use of the STC Program. Here you will find previous editions materials for 2nd Edition STCElementary, STC Secondary, and STC/MS.
Smithsonian's Grade 1-5 instruction, designed explicitly for NGSS, brings phenomena-based and problem-based learning to your classroom!
subMenus.displayName: Smithsonian Science for the Classroom - First Edition

topCategories.description: Moving to NGSS? Begin with STC-Kindergarten™, written explicitly for these standards. STC for Grades 1–5 integrates the three dimensions of NGSS and engineering design using real-world applications.
ALL NEW for Middle School from the Smithsonian! Teaching NGSS is more than checking off standards. STCMS™ immerses students in 3-dimensional learning rooted in phenomena and engineering design.
Thank you for your continued use of the STC Program. Here you will find previous editions materials for 2nd Edition STCElementary, STC Secondary, and STC/MS.

attributes.description: Keep your classroom or lab safe throughout the schoolyear with lots of helpful tips, hints, and safety techniques.

mostPopular.displayName: Owl Pellets in the Classroom: Safety Guidelines
Safety, Storage, and Disposal of Preserved Specimens
Which Leaf Shape Can Hold the Most Butterfly Eggs?

attributes.description: Caring for your living organisms is critical to your success in the classroom. Find Care Sheets for our organisms and get prepared before your shipment arrives.

mostPopular.displayName: How to Care for Painted Lady Butterfly Cultures

mostPopular.description: Complete care instructions and tips for freshwater fish

attributes.description: A comprehensive list of all (M)SDS available for Carolina's products. We recommend using the Search box at the top of the website to locate an (M)SDS even faster.
Browse our dissection guides for product recommendations, resources and how-to information for your next classroom dissection.
Get help teaching complex techniques, setting up products, and gain critical knowledge before your class.

Contact Us

Our Customer Service team is available from 8am to 6:00pm, ET, Monday through Friday. Live chat is available from 8am to 5:30pm ET, Monday-Friday.

International Sales & Service

We serve educators in more than 170 countries worldwide. Create a quote request on our website or contact our International Sales Team.
